title: r/Tifu By Sucking My Waiter's Finger In A Restaurant!
description: r/Tifu What do you get when you mix margaritas with a confusing birthday celebration? A truly awkward finger-sucking experience. The waiter was trying to put whipped cream on OP's nose as part of their happy birthday song, but drunk OP thought, "Oh, I know what to do! I'm supposed to suck whipped cream off his finger!" So, she gobbled this complete stranger's finger into her mouth in the middle of a crowded restaurant.
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
